Reviews.Title: “Excellent find for cruisers”
Reviews.Author: alibilly2004
Reviews.Content: hotel recommended travel agent stay night cruise los angeles san pedro mile cruise terminal looked top notch hotel 1880s elegant huge windows looked antique furniture deal offered nights stay breakfast shuttle cruise ship terminal free secure parking fourteen days 172 excellent deal considering parking terminal 168 hotel found niche hope continue prosper cruisers choose stay
